attributes.action: open talks with Derby County Football Club to allow all season tickets in the South stand to remain there. Ww are loyal supporters and deserve respect from Derby County Football Club.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
We are south stand season ticket holders and supporters of Derby County Football Club. who are against the Derby County Football Club enforced relocation of all south stand season ticket holders. 

Yes Derby County Football Club are forcing all season ticket holders located in the south stand to relocate there season tickets to other areas of the stadium.

This is not right and is not fair on the loyal supporters who go to pride park week in week out in all weather conditions.

This shows a total lack of respect for the supporters of Derby County Football Club.

reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
